SEARCH
Package app.src.resources.components

Class Hitbox

java.lang.Object
app.src.resources.components.Rectangle
app.src.resources.components.Hitbox
public class Hitbox extends Rectangle
Extends the Rectangle class to add offsets for an entity location and a damage multiplier to create different hitbox types like cirtical hitbox.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Hitbox(int width, int height, int offsetX, int offsetY, int newDamageMultiplier)
    Creates a Rectangle and adds offsets for x and y and a damage multiplier.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hitbox

      public Hitbox(int width, int height, int offsetX, int offsetY, int newDamageMultiplier)
      Creates a Rectangle and adds offsets for x and y and a damage multiplier.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the hitbox
      height - height of the hitbox
      offsetX - offset value for x
      offsetY - offset value for y
      newDamageMultiplier - allows differentiation between standard and cirtical hitboxes

      Parameters:

      newY - new y location
